Imaginary Cloud | Engineer Manager | Lisbon, Portugal | Visa | Onsite https://https://www.imaginarycloud.com/about

---

Imaginary Cloud is a successful and fast-growing company, working to design and develop cutting-edge web and mobile products.

As an experienced Software Engineer, and hands-on technologist, you will bring a passion for building software, taking ownership of projects end to end, managing a broad scope of software challenges, and driving development in an iterative, agile manner using best practices.

We came up with our own Product Design Process which we apply to our work and we take the best of traditional engineering and project management practices, applying them to your product.

---

To check our Engineer Manager job opening and apply, please check: https://www.imaginarycloud.com/positions/engineering-manager
